contains_instance[source]

contains_instance(elements:list, instance)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
test_eq(True, contains_instance([1,2,3], int))
test_eq(False, contains_instance([1,2,3], float))
{% endraw %}
